Content of Request for Supplemental Examination [R-11.2013]
AN IDENTIFICATION OF THE PATENT FOR WHICH SUPPLEMENTAL EXAMINATION IS REQUESTED
A LIST OF ALL ITEMS OF INFORMATION SUBMITTED WITH OR AS PART OF THE REQUEST
A LIST OF PRIOR OR CONCURRENT POST-PATENT OFFICE PROCEEDINGS
IDENTIFICATION OF EACH CLAIM OF THE PATENT FOR WHICH SUPPLEMENTAL EXAMINATION IS REQUESTED
A SEPARATE, DETAILED EXPLANATION OF RELEVANCE AND MANNER OF APPLYING EACH ITEM OF INFORMATION TO EACH PATENT CLAIM FOR WHICH SUPPLEMENTAL EXAMINATION IS REQUESTED
A COPY OF THE PATENT FOR WHICH SUPPLEMENTAL EXAMINATION IS REQUESTED, AND A COPY OF ANY DISCLAIMER OR CERTIFICATE ISSUED FOR THE PATENT
A COPY OF EACH ITEM OF INFORMATION
A SUMMARY OF THE RELEVANT PORTIONS OF ANY DOCUMENT, OTHER THAN THE REQUEST, WHICH IS OVER FIFTY PAGES IN LENGTH
AN IDENTIFICATION OF THE OWNER(S) OF THE ENTIRE RIGHT, TITLE, AND INTEREST IN THE PATENT REQUESTED TO BE EXAMINED, AND A SUBMISSION UNDER 37 CFR 3.73(c)
Detailed Explanation of the Relevance and Manner of Applying Each Item of Information [R-11.2013]
